short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to copy the email address of the sender in Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:

This extension only does one thing, it adds a button that copies the email address of the sender!

ğŸ° STORY TIME ğŸ°
âš”ï¸ We spent an hour creating this extension, to save 2 seconds every time we want to copy the sender's email address. Why? We want to copy it quite often! Usually to add the sender to a CRM, or search for the sender in our inbox. It made sense for us to finally add a copy button where we need it the most, next to the sender's email address. With this extension... we also want YOU to save 2 seconds!

â“ Frequently asked questions:

ğŸ“Œ What does this extension do?
- It copies the sender's email address.

ğŸ“Œ Do you save any data?

ğŸ“Œ How does it work?
- When you open a conversation/email in Gmail, the extension will look for the sender's email address. Two pixels to the right, it will add a nice and clean copy button. If you would click this button (we recommend you do), you will copy the sender's email address!
